s.text: and uh uh ended up writing a writing them a a fan letter
they uh they wrote back and told me when they were coming to Seattle so i met them when they were here they were were really funny just a moment
anyway anyway yeah i met them it was it was kind of interesting i'd been wondering for a long time where these guys were from
